oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: USN-1023-1 -- linux, linux-{ec2,source-2.6.15} vulnerabilities
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Nelson Elhage discovered several problems with the Acorn Econet protocol driver. A local user could cause a denial of service via a NULL pointer dereference, escalate privileges by overflowing the kernel stack, and assign Econet addresses to arbitrary interfaces.

oval-def:modified.comment: EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:13412 - added CVE references; also made minor updates
